name: Mold Zombie
description: The Mold Zombie is a decaying figure draped in fungal growths, exuding a foul odor. Its skin is rotting, and it is often surrounded by clouds of spores.
memorable: Its ability to explode in spores upon death and spread disease makes it particularly terrifying.
goals: To spread disease and chaos, utilizing its necrotic energy to weaken foes.
relations: Often found alongside other undead creatures or in places of decay and rot.
environment: Grim environments, particularly places plagued by death or disease.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage; strong Constitution enhances survivability.
weaknesses: Very low Dexterity makes it slow and vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: It can deliver two slam attacks dealing both bludgeoning and necrotic damage, alongside a powerful area effect with its Plague Breath.
most_powerful_ability: Spore Death - explodes in a cloud of spores upon being reduced to 0 hit points, potentially damaging and infecting nearby creatures.
additional_information: Resistant to exhaustion and poisoned conditions.
Uses Bludgeoning and Necrotic damage in attacks.
Can become even more threatening by spreading iumenta pox disease.
Undead Fortitude allows it to potentially survive lethal damage.
Chaotic evil intentions drive its aggressive behavior.
test_queries: undead creature with spore death ability
zombie that explodes and infects nearby foes
slow but resilient undead in grim places
